html:
4.30.20  5:36 am   could you eat blades of grass?

      i could but i'm not going to

4.30.20  5:34 am   what is your opinion on small things?

      too big

4.30.20  5:25 am   If you really are Bill Wurtz, what's something only the real Bill Wurtz would say? (I am a big fan and I love your music.)

      holy east and west croydon combined, you are very friendly

4.30.20  4:52 am   Bill Wurtz, have you been self-isolating?

     yes, but not because i'm sick. it's because everyone else is sick

     Are you working on new videos while under quarantine?

      i am re inventing the graphics department

4.30.20  4:11 am   what does whenst mean 

      when, as, and during the time which. (when + whilst)

4.30.20  4:11 am   in which order do you write melody, harmony, lyrics and arrangement?

      melody/harmony/lyric first. arrangement second

4.30.20  3:53 am   do you have any specific advice for improvising jazz on keyboard (besides the obvious 'practice')? how do I add more colour to my solos- even when I solo over something as simple as c dorian it all sounds boring and repetitive. thanks! big fan of your work (:

      you're gonna have to think about something else. bring something else into the picture. let's say you are in one of those C dorian jam vamps you find yourself in. Well, think about the logistics of building a car with 5 wheels. i think you'll feel your life suddenly has more direction

4.30.20  3:24 am   hi! i just want to say thank you for a lot of things. first, you make awesome music that brightens my day everyday. second, you continue to inspire me with your music and help me find the motivation to do the things i want to do (very different things). lastly, thank you for making this page and all your wonderful answers and advices. without your guidance i'd be wallowing in the deepest trenches of ruts to get stuck in. thank you, bill. and know that i mean it when i say you're one of the coolest people in the world. lots o' love!

      holy entire cranberry bog, or at least most of it

4.30.20  3:18 am   Imagine imagining you imagined an imagination.

      ah yes, i can see it so vividly now

4.30.20  2:57 am   why do you create songs for the internet

      they are for the world, but the internet is a very good delivery mechanism

4.30.20  2:30 am   What are your thoughts on New Mexico?

      it's actually pretty old

4.30.20  2:20 am   Who's your favorite artist?

      could be you

4.30.20  2:01 am   Hey bill, i dont have a question, I just came here to say that you're awesome and that your songs and videos are absolutely amazing!

      holy spinning orb of power, you are very friendly

4.30.20  1:22 am   Can I ask a question?

      ah, but did you ask first if you could ask that question

4.30.20  1:12 am   What's your favourite toppings on a pizza

      rice

4.30.20  12:32 am   ok have you ever received a question mentioning thinking, specifically saying "do you think"

     yes

      it's important

4.30.20  12:31 am   am i allowed to stare at the wall?

      yes, thank you for checking with me first

4.30.20  12:21 am   are you a flower

      no but i can see why you would think that

4.30.20  12:05 am   Opinions on basketballs?

      too real

4.30.20  12:03 am   what is music

      some kind of serum

4.29.20  11:57 pm   Anything you like in Jack of Speed?

      that intro

4.29.20  11:52 pm   What do you think about in general?

      feelings

4.29.20  11:48 pm   Is love a 4 letter word that you can use in various ways that are mostly positive

      hm, that sounds about right

4.29.20  11:33 pm   is money important for everything?

      no

4.29.20  11:17 pm   Is life pointless?

      no

4.29.20  10:47 pm   How did you decide on the hex codes for the colors used on this website?

      based on the way the colors look

4.29.20  10:33 pm   what is your opinion on batteries

      they are like piles, of energy

4.29.20  10:32 pm   what is the reason that you are afraid of being influenced by outside trends

      what is the reason you think i am

4.29.20  10:32 pm   do gangster rappers know how to love?

      yes

4.29.20  10:18 pm   What's a word?

      'punt', for example

4.29.20  10:02 pm   Do you write lyrics or melody first, or both at the same time

      sametime

4.29.20  9:51 pm   have you ever taught a class?

     no

     if so, how did it go?

4.29.20  9:36 pm   How do you cure the hiccups?

      you must pass it on, to someone else

4.29.20  9:32 pm   Are you potato?

      no

4.29.20  9:27 pm   how do I ask a question?

      impossible. it can't be done

4.29.20  9:24 pm   How do you feel about a nine dollar bill bill?

      fake

4.29.20  9:20 pm   i think i ate my kazoo.. What should i do

      eat another one, for dessert

4.29.20  9:18 pm   is there a point to capitalizing letters?

      yes

4.29.20  8:57 pm   whenever you're in a creativity block, how do you get out of it? currently at an art block and don't feel inspired, so I thought I'd ask you

      you must think outside the block

4.29.20  8:57 pm   bill would you still answer my questions if I was a worm

      maybe if you were a whole can of worms

4.29.20  8:50 pm   Any advice for someone trying to write their first song? 

      sure

4.29.20  8:41 pm   Why is my homework so stupid?

      to see if you'll notice

4.29.20  8:39 pm   Can you help with my persistent depression?

      i will try

4.29.20  8:21 pm   Why doesn't " vacationing in the center of the earth" in expert mode have any content attached to it?

      it is just a message. the message is the content

4.29.20  8:12 pm   what is the most recent cool songwriting device you have discovered?

      making the song extremely loud

4.29.20  7:37 pm   what is your favorite hose setting

      full blast

4.29.20  7:34 pm   favourite war crime??

      peace

4.29.20  7:07 pm   what is a thing your proud of???????

      facts, for being true

4.29.20  7:01 pm   I'm a huge fan of your music, how did you keep inspired to keep on working?

      because music is awesome and can express the hidden secrets of the universe

4.29.20  7:00 pm   what happens if I have already invented the world, what do I do then?

      invent another one
